title: FAR FLUNG FLOYD: KEITH FLOYD'S GUIDE TO SOUTH-EAST ASIAN FOOD
description: Keith Floyd (28 December 1943 â€“ 14 September 2009) was a British celebrity chef, television personality and restaurateur, who hosted cooking shows for the BBC and published many books combining cookery and travel. On television, his eccentric style of presentation endeared him to millions of viewers worldwide.
author: Keith Floyd
